messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Atmos.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Looking for cyborg volunteers, we need a janitor

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The bridge has been blown, needs fixing as soon as possible

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Weed is now legal, contact me for details

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: What kind of virus we working with here?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Station priority is to contain the level 7 outbreak

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Did the SM just blow up?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a horde of wire eating mammals have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.
